citation: Local Government (Burnie City Council) Amendment Order 2004 (Tas)
text:
Local Government (Burnie City Council) Amendment Order 2004

I, the Administrator in and over the State of Tasmania and its Dependencies in the Commonwealth of Australia, acting with the advice of the Executive Council and on the recommendation of the Minister, make the following order under section 12 of the Local Government Act 1993 .

29 November 2004

PETER G. UNDERWOOD

Administrator

By His Excellency's Command,

J. G. COX

Minister Assisting the Premier on Local Government

1. Short title
    This order may be cited as the Local Government (Burnie City Council) Amendment Order 2004 .

2. Commencement
    This order takes effect on the day on which its making is notified in the Gazette.

3. Principal Order
    In this order, the Local Government (Burnie City Council) Order 2002 is referred to as the Principal Order.

4.
    The amendment effected by this clause has been incorporated into the authorised version of the Local Government (Burnie City Council) Order 2002 .

5.
    The amendments effected by this clause have been incorporated into the authorised version of the Local Government (Burnie City Council) Order 2002 .

Displayed and numbered in accordance with the Rules Publication Act 1953.

Notified in the Gazette on 8 December 2004

This order is administered in the Department of Premier and Cabinet.
